widgets_values:
For good results, you should follow the prompting style in the examples here: https://github.com/Lightricks/LTX-Video

You can use image captioner to get the overall description of the scene and tweak it to get the desired results.

Image captioning doesn't address the kind of motion that happens in the scenes. Consider adding this part manually or using an LLM of your choice.

Suggested suffixes:

The scene is captured in real-life footage.
The scene appears to be from a movie or TV show.
The scene is computer-generated imagery.

The video shows a red sports car driving on a winding mountain road. The car is in the center of the video, with its headlights on, and it appears to be moving at a high speed. The road is surrounded by lush greenery on both sides, with tall mountains in the background. The sky is overcast, and the overall mood of the video is dramatic and dramatic. The video is taken from a low angle, looking up at the car as it navigates the curves of the road.A red sportscar is driving down a highway through a lush canyon, 60s retrofuturistic look, melancholic, vhs style.The scene is captured in real-life footage.

- The similarity between the color-corrected and non-color-corrected frames should be over 97, otherwise there's probably been discoloration
- The similarity between the first and last frames should be less than 98, otherwise this segment is likely either frozen or has too little movement.
A red sportscar is driving down a highway through a lush canyon, 60s retrofuturistic look, melancholic, vhs style.
The scene is captured in real-life footage.

nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Negative Prompt)
widgets_values: this video is of low quality, blurry, low quality, worst quality, deformed, distorted, disfigured, motion smear, motion artifacts, fused fingers, bad anatomy, weird hand, ugly, text, watermark
